sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './General.css'; const General = () => { const adminToken='eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwczpcL1wvc2Uuc2Vsb3BpYW4udXNcL2FwaVwvYWRtaW5cL2xvZ2luIiwiaWF0IjoxNjc1MTYxNTgwLCJleHAiOjE2NzUxNjUxODAsIm5iZiI6MTY3NTE2MTU4MCwianRpIjoiOXlsemZVb2tlYVJhcXpTcCIsInN1YiI6MSwicHJ2IjoiZGY4ODNkYjk3YmQwNWVmOGZmODUwODJkNjg2YzQ1ZTgzMmU1OTNhOSJ9.xPYKbVWUBbq9G07FjGiBJsy6jC5QCLb7LUdjHwx9s18'; const handleUpload = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const site_name = event.target.site_name.value; const site_email = event.target.site_email.value; const site_phone = event.target.site_phone.value; const site_address=event.target.site_address.value; const site_facebook = event.target.site_facebook.value; const site_twitter = event.target.site_twitter.value; const site_linkedin= event.target.site_linkedin.value; const site_instagram=event.target.site_instagram.value; const site_youtube = event.target.site_youtube.value; const site_pinterest = event.target.site_pinterest.value; const site_about= event.target.site_about.value; const logo=event.target.logo.value; const favicon=event.target.favicon.value; console.log(logo,favicon); const url = 'https://se.selopian.us/api/admin/general-setting-update'; //fetch data const postData = { site_name: site_name, site_email:site_email, site_phone:site_phone, site_address:site_address, site_facebook:site_facebook, site_twitter:site_twitter, site_linkedin:site_linkedin, site_youtube:site_youtube, site_pinterest:site_pinterest, } const formData = new FormData(); fetch(url, { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ site_name, site_email, site_phone, site_address,site_facebook,site_twitter,site_linkedin,site_youtube,site_pinterest,site_about,logo,favicon, }), headers: { headers:{ 'Authorization':`bearer ${adminToken}`}, }, }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data) event.target.reset(); }); } return (
); }; export default General;
